question: Indo-EU bilateral project ‘India-h2o’ was recently inaugurated by the Prime Minister in which institution?
option2: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi virtually participated in the convocation ceremony of the Pandit Deendayal Petroleum University, Gujarat.
He inaugurated five state-of-the-art facilities including ‘India-h2o’, an Indo-EU bilateral project for industrial waste and desalination, under Horizon 2020 initiative. He also said that the country has set a target of reducing its carbon footprint by 30 to 35 per cent.
